choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for this week.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews

### Response:


Sure, here is a healthy meal plan for you for the week:

Monday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with frozen berries, spinach, kale, and banana.
- Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (such as broccoli, sweet potatoes, and bell peppers) and a side salad made with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado.
- Dinner: Baked salmon with quinoa and steamed broccoli.

Tuesday:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with fresh fruit (such as berries or sliced banana) and granola.
- Lunch: Hummus and vegetable wrap with a side salad made with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado.
- Dinner: Vegetable stir fry made with tofu, mushrooms, bell peppers, onions, and broccoli.

Wednesday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with frozen berries, spinach, kale, and banana.
- Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (such as broccoli, sweet potatoes, and bell peppers) and a side salad made with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado.
- Dinner: Vegetable soup made with vegetable broth, carrots, onions, garlic, and celery.

Thursday:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with fresh fruit (such as berries or sliced banana) and granola.
- Lunch: Hummus and vegetable wrap with a side salad made with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado.
- Dinner: Vegetable stir fry made with tofu, mushrooms, bell peppers, onions, and broccoli.

Friday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with frozen berries, spinach, kale, and banana.
- Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (such as broccoli, sweet potatoes, and bell peppers) and a side salad made with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado.
- Dinner: Baked salmon with quinoa and steamed broccoli.

Saturday:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with fresh fruit (such as berries or sliced banana) and granola.
- Lunch: Hummus and vegetable wrap with a side salad made with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado.
- Dinner: Vegetable soup made with vegetable broth, carrots, onions, garlic, and celery.

Sunday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with frozen berries, spinach, kale, and banana.
- Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (such as broccoli, sweet potatoes, and bell peppers) and a side salad made with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado.
- Dinner: Baked salmon with quinoa and steamed broccoli. 

I hope this helps! Let me know if you need any further assistance.
